$schema.description: The engine state JSON schema for the document. Ideally, points to this document.

v.description: The semantic version number of the engine this baseline relates to.

interval.description: The duration between iterations of the engine.

enabled.description:
Is the resource control enabled?
Setting this to `false` has no effect, as resource control is always active.

resources.description: The resource control settings of this state.

enabled.description:
Should engine states be enabled?
Setting this to `false` has no effect, as state management is always active.
Should we skip asking for confirmation for destructive operations?
Should copied data be compressed with KG-internal LZString compression?

bonfire.description: Features relating to the Bonfire tab.

trigger.description: What's the trigger value for this automation?

buildings.description: Configuration for which buildings to build automatically.

turnOnSteamworks.description: Should Steamworks be turned on if they are turned off?

turnOnMagnetos.description: Should Magnetos be turned on if they are turned off?

enabled.description: Automatically upgrade Amphitheatres to Broadcast Towers?
Automatically upgrade Libraries to Data Centers?
Automatically upgrade Aqueducts to Hydro Plants?
Automatically upgrade Pastures to Solar Farms?

religion.description: Features relating to the Religion tab.

trigger.description: What's the trigger value for this automation?

buildings.description: Configuration for which buildings to build automatically.

enabled.description: Should we enforce to always build the most lucrative building first?

trigger.description: Sacrifice when we have this many alicorns.
Sacrifice when we have this many unicorns.

enabled.description: Should we refine unicorn tears into BLS?

trigger.description: Refine when we have this many tears.

enabled.description: Should we refine time crystals into relics?

trigger.description: Refine when we have this many time crystals.
Praise when we have this much faith.
Adore when we have this much epiphany.

enabled.description: Should we transcend whenever it would be lucrative?

science.description: Features relating to the Science tab.

enabled.description: Is the technology research automation enabled?

observe.description: Settings for automatic astronomical event observation.

space.description: Features relating to the Space tab.

trigger.description: What's the trigger value for this automation?

buildings.description: Configuration for which buildings to build automatically.

unlockMissions.description: Configuration for which space missions to conduct automatically.

timeControl.description: Features relating to controlling time in the game.

trigger.description: Accelerate time when we have this much temporal flux.
Amount of time crystals we need to have available.

max.description: How many years to skip at most.

cycles.description: The cycles during which to skip.

seasons.description: The seasons during which to skip.

enabled.description: Should we ignore overheating and just skip as much as configured?
Ignored, as reset sub-sections are always enabled.

buildings.description: The bonfire buildings that must be built for a reset to be possible.

enabled.description: Ignored, as reset sub-sections are always enabled.

buildings.description: The religion buildings that must be built for a reset to be possible.

enabled.description: Ignored, as reset sub-sections are always enabled.

resources.description: The resources we need to have in stock for a reset to be possible.

enabled.description: Ignored, as reset sub-sections are always enabled.

buildings.description: The space buildings that must be built for a reset to be possible.

enabled.description: Ignored, as reset sub-sections are always enabled.

buildings.description: The time buildings that must be built for a reset to be possible.

enabled.description: Ignored, as reset sub-sections are always enabled.

upgrades.description: The upgrades we must have researched for a reset to be possible.

time.description: Features relating to the Time tab.

trigger.description: What's the trigger value for this automation?

buildings.description: Configuration for which buildings to build automatically.

enabled.description: Should chrono furnaces be turned on automatically?

trade.description: Features relating to the Trade tab.

trigger.description: What's the trigger value for this automation?

enabled.description: Should we feed leviathans whenever possible?

trigger.description: What's the trigger value for this automation?
How many relics should you have to sell?

village.description: Features relating to the Village tab.

enabled.description: Should we send hunters on hunts?

trigger.description: Amount of catpower to have available.

job.description: Which job should the leader have?

trait.description: Which trait should the leader have?

workshop.description: Features relating to the Workshop tab.

enabled.description: Treat ships as unlimited crafting until we have 243?
